title: Keyfragment glitch (not drop rate complaint)
body:
OK, so this is going to be short

I have had 2 announcements in the after-game chat screen stating I had found a key fragment

but whenever I go into my inventory it isn't showing, I'm just stuck on 1 key fragment. 

riot please help I've searched everywhere and I may be the only one experiencing this problem

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried restarting your client, sometimes pages will display incorrectly in the client unless you restart.

Are you sure you earnt the key fragments and the message you received wasn't an ineligibility message?

If they're still not displaying and you're sure you've earnt them, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support as they're the only ones who can help with these issues.
thank you SephirothSG, I'll submit a ticket :)
